# AVExperienceController.Experience

**Enumeration**

The types of experiences the system supports.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Experience
```

## Supported experiences

- **AVExperienceController.Experience.embedded**: An experience where the video embeds within its original container.
- **AVExperienceController.Experience.expanded**: An experience where the system places the video outside of its original container.
- **AVExperienceController.Experience.multiview**: An experience where multiple videos play together.

## Enumeration Cases

- **AVExperienceController.Experience.immersive**: Indicates an experience in which the video extends beyond the app window boundaries/container.

## Configuring the experience

- **allowedExperiences**: The set of experiences the application supports.
- **availableExperiences**: The allowed experiences that are available to use on the device at this time.
- **AVExperienceController.Experiences**: A structure that represents a collection of experiences to use with an experience controller.
- **experience**: The current experience.
- **configuration**: The configuration options per experience.
- **AVExperienceController.Configuration**: A structure that stores per-experience configuration.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
